name: Blue Horizon
description: A story driven open world first person, single player game. A fantasy action adventure set in the Golden age of Caribbean Piracy. Fight Pirates and creatures, discover islands and caves, ports and tribal villages. Build up your inventory, craft ships and rule the waves, Blue Horizon has it all!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64-Bit Processor: AMX A6/Intel i5 Memory: 4096 MB RAM Graphics: 1 Gig VRAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3800 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 64-Bit Processor: AMX FX/Intel i7 Memory: 8192 MB RAM Graphics: R9 290, GTX 970, 2Gig VRAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3800 MB available space
